evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs are non-profit organizations that were awarded federal grant funding. They work to train and assist law enforcement, correctional facilities staff, prosecutors, and states and localities.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: public interest nonprofit (Vera Institute of Justice, Center for Children & Youth Justice, Chinese for Affirmative Action, FORCE Detroit, Health Resources in Action)
